history.narrative: Law 17-155 the “Producer Licensing Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-252 which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 5, 2008, and March 4, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 19, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-327 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-155 became effective on May 13, 2008.
